ch0124_40_mao/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey there! Thanks for stopping by! How have you
been, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0124_40_mao/0101_0701_02_10:
Today’s Mallow Special is even more special
than usual, so I hope you’re excited!
ch0124_40_mao/7101_0701_01_10:
Hey, don’t you think these clothes are super cute?
I look like someone who works at a café!
ch0124_40_mao/7101_0701_02_10:
With these cute clothes and Mallow’s special
sweets, I could open a shop whenever I want!
ch0124_40_mao/7102_0701_01_10:
When I’m cooking, the most important thing to me
is to give it my all!
ch0124_40_mao/7102_0701_02_10:
Cooking is a special gift to whoever is
gonna eat the food.
ch0124_40_mao/7103_0701_01_10:
Appletun can release a sweet scent from its body
to lure in other Pokémon!
ch0124_40_mao/7103_0701_02_10:
Sometimes that sweet aroma can also attract
hungry people.
ch0124_40_mao/7103_0701_03_10:
I was so surprised recently because Team Break
showed up!
ch0124_40_mao/7104_0701_01_10:
The skin on Appletun’s back is so sweet, it can be
a snack just as it is!
ch0124_40_mao/7104_0701_02_10:
I’m thinking I may be able to make something with
that skin and Moomoo Milk.
ch0124_40_mao/7104_0701_03_10:
When I make the Mallow Special dessert, please
come try it!
ch0124_40_mao/7105_0701_01_10:
I’m planning on giving you a gift to
show my gratitude for everything you
do, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...
ch0124_40_mao/7105_0701_02_10: But until then, I’m gonna keep it a secret!
ch0124_40_mao/1701_0701_01_10: Ta-da! A gift from the bottom of Mallow’s heart!
ch0124_40_mao/1701_0702_01_10: When you smile, I can’t help but smile, too!
ch0124_40_mao/2501_0701_01_10:
I’ve recently been studying other regions’
local sweets.
ch0124_40_mao/2501_0701_02_10: Alola is famous for its malasadas...
ch0124_40_mao/2501_0701_03_10:
And in Galar, where Appletun is from, they have
these things called Sweets!
ch0124_40_mao/2501_0701_04_10:
They also have something called Whipped-Cream
Curry. I wonder how it tastes...
ch0124_40_mao/2501_0702_01_10: Does your hometown have a local treat, too?
ch0124_40_mao/2501_0702_02_10:
If you tell me about it in detail, I could
recreate it using ingredients on Pasio!
ch0124_40_mao/2511_0701_01_10:
My dad and brother are supercool chefs, and I’m
so proud of them!
ch0124_40_mao/2511_0701_02_10:
Once I hone my cooking skills and perfect the
ultimate Mallow Special...
ch0124_40_mao/2511_0701_03_10: I’ll make it for them to thank them for everything!
ch0124_40_mao/2511_0702_01_10:
I think if my dad and brother tried my cooking,
they’d understand my feelings.
ch0124_40_mao/2511_0702_02_10:
After all, the Mallow Special I make is full
of gratitude!
ch0124_40_mao/3001_0701_01_10:
I’m feeling good and ready to go! Hmm...
Now what should I make for breakfast?
ch0124_40_mao/3003_0701_01_10:
If you’re tired, some sweets might perk you up!
I could whip up a Mallow Special!
ch0124_40_mao/3005_0701_01_10:
For a good night’s sleep, I like a nice glass
of Moomoo Milk. Maybe some sweets, too!
